translation.en: Welcome back to The Diving Rose,
coming to you from our little slice of paradise, Cape Mercy.
translation.it: direttamente dal nostro piccolo angolo di paradiso, Cape Mercy.

translation.en: If you're new to my channel, I'm Lauren, and these are my friends.
translation.it: Se non conoscete il mio canale, io sono Lauren e loro sono le mie amiche.

translation.en: Hi!
We're ready to hunt for treasure. Are you guys coming?
translation.it: Siamo pronte a cercare il tesoro. Venite?

translation.en: Let's go!
-What a find! -Woo!
Open it! Open it!
Cool.
Typical of the Victorian era.
This is so you can keep loved ones close as you travel.
translation.it: Così puoi tenerti vicini i tuoi cari mentre viaggi.

translation.en: -Careful! Hey! - It survived a hundred years underwater.
translation.it: - Attenta! - Ehi! È sopravvissuto 100 anni sott'acqua, speriamo che sopravviva a Stevie.

translation.en: -Let's hope it survives Stevie! -Ha.
translation.it: È sopravvissuto 100 anni sott'acqua, speriamo che sopravviva a Stevie.

translation.en: I bet this is worth some coin! [growls]
Hey, hey, hey. We return lost items, not sell them.
translation.it: Ehi, ehi! Restituiamo gli oggetti smarriti, non li vendiamo!

translation.en: Now, I think the current's dragged in from the Cape Mercy shipwrecks.
translation.it: Direi che le correnti l'hanno trascinato dai relitti di Cape Mercy.

translation.en: Now, that would be a dive.
Sure, if you like shark-infested waters. -We are never doing that dive. -No shark-infested waters.
translation.it: Certo, se ti piacciono le acque infestate dagli squali. Non la faremo mai!

translation.en: Never say 'never'.
I wonder who she was.
-That's coming in fast. -We better go. Now!
translation.it: Sta arrivando in fretta. Meglio andare. Subito.

translation.en: Quick, put the mainsail out.
Ahoy, Sea Dog!
Why weren't you lot in earlier?
Sorry, Grandad. The weather was clear this morning.
translation.it: Scusa, nonno. Stamani il tempo era sereno.

translation.en: It suddenly turned on us.
[grandad] This is no summer squall.
This is gonna be a big one!
Better get her into the cove.
Tighter!
Here, let me.
I got it.
Got it.
There you go.
Oh! My phone! I left it in the boat.
translation.it: Il telefono. L'ho lasciato in barca.

translation.en: You guys just, just go.
My mother will have expected me home hours ago. I better go.
translation.it: Mia madre mi aspettava a casa ore fa. Devo andare.

translation.en: Time to batten the hatches.
But what about Lauren?
Oh, it's fine, really. Go.
-I'll wait, it's... -No, no, it's OK. Ok.
Yes!
♪ Deep in the ocean High on the sea ♪
translation.it: Nel profondo dell'oceano, in alto mare Vi aspetta un tesoro dimenticato a lungo

translation.en: ♪ Treasure long forgotten waits for thee ♪
translation.it: Nel profondo dell'oceano, in alto mare Vi aspetta un tesoro dimenticato a lungo PERSONA SCOMPARSA LAUREN ROSE

translation.en: ♪ Clouds will thicken and the moon will hide ♪ ♪ Look for the omens within the tide ♪
translation.it: Le nuvole si addensano, la luna si cela Cercate i presagi nella marea

translation.en: ♪ Hi-ho, hi-ho ♪
♪ Clouds will thicken and the moon will hide ♪
translation.it: Le nuvole si addensano, la luna si cela

translation.en: ♪ Hi-ho, hi-ho ♪
♪ Look for the omens within the tide ♪
♪ Hi-ho, hi-ho ♪
♪ Waters run dark when she comes to the shore ♪
translation.it: Le acque diventano scure Quando lei giunge a riva

translation.en: ♪ Hi-ho, hi-ho ♪
♪ Till her mighty ship rides the waves no more. ♪♪
translation.it: Finché la sua potente nave Non cavalca più le onde

translation.en: [man] But we'll continue to search until Lauren is found safely... Hey, Chief.
translation.it: - Continueremo a cercare Lauren. - Ehi, sceriffo.

translation.en: Stevie, you'll know as soon as we find anything.
I know, but you've gotta let us help, Chief. We can be useful.
translation.it: Lo so, ma vogliamo aiutare. Possiamo essere utili!

translation.en: No, not again.
What if we take one of the cruisers out? Huh? Fresh eyes.
translation.it: E se prendiamo un cabinato? Occhi freschi.

translation.en: If you wanna help, Lauren, leave it to the professionals!
translation.it: Se vuoi aiutare, lascia fare ai professionisti!

translation.en: What if she never took the boat out. She could be lost on land.
translation.it: E se non ha preso la barca? - Potrebbe essersi persa a terra... - Continua ad affiggere i poster.

translation.en: Keep putting up the posters, OK?
translation.it: - Potrebbe essersi persa a terra... - Continua ad affiggere i poster.

translation.en: OK.
They're looking in the wrong place.
Lauren knows better than to sail the 'Indy' headfirst into a cyclone.
translation.it: Lauren sa di non navigare verso un ciclone!

translation.en: Exactly - why would Lauren help pack the skiff, drag it onto the sand
translation.it: Esatto! Perché Lauren dovrebbe aiutare a mettere a posto la barca

translation.en: just to unpack it and haul it back out ten minutes later?
translation.it: per poi riportarla fuori dieci minuti dopo?

translation.en: She wouldn't.
[man on radio] Cape Mercy Tower, helicopter 727, 10 north-west, in-bound.
translation.it: Torre Cape Mercy, Elicottero 727, dieci nordovest, in arrivo.

translation.en: [girl] That's a capsized boat down there.
[man] A cyclone'll do that.
Your specialty, my nightmare.
translation.it: La tua specialità. Il mio incubo.

translation.en: Give your dad a chance, kiddo.
You can't have all your best holidays with Mum.
translation.it: Non puoi passare tutte le migliori vacanze con mamma.

translation.en: Fine. But, as long as I get to keep my feet dry.
translation.it: Va bene. Mi basta tenere i piedi asciutti.

translation.en: Yeah, we'll see.
[woman on radio] Cleared for landing, 727.
We're representing a town in crisis, not attending a French film festival, Anna.
translation.it: Rappresentiamo una città in crisi, non siamo a un festival del cinema francese.

translation.en: The Chief is going out again this morning, isn't he?
translation.it: Lo sceriffo uscirà anche stamani, vero?

translation.en: Where do you think they'll be looking? The northern coastline?
translation.it: Dove pensi che cercheranno? Sulla costa nord?

translation.en: I'm sure they'll be very thorough.
Well, if they find the 'Indy' and the mast is down,
translation.it: Se trovano la Indy e l'albero è abbassato,

translation.en: that proves she couldn't have been sailing it.
translation.it: è la prova che non può averla presa lei.

translation.en: We've spoken about this.
translation.it: è la prova che non può averla presa lei. Ne abbiamo già parlato.

translation.en: We just really don't think she took the boat out, Mother.
translation.it: Noi crediamo che non abbia preso la barca, mamma.

translation.en: Lauren was last seen at the boat, you said so yourselves.
translation.it: Lauren è stata vista l'ultima volta alla barca. L'avete detto anche voi.

translation.en: She just went to get her phone.
translation.it: È andata a prendere il telefono.

translation.en: And did you see her come back?
And now the boat is gone.
translation.it: E ora la barca non c'è più.

translation.en: Dr. John Martin, engineer. And my daughter Izzie.
translation.it: Dr. John Martin, ingegnere. E mia figlia Izzie.

translation.en: Renee Volkov, mayor. And this is my daughter Anna.
translation.it: Renee Volkov, sindaco. E lei è mia figlia Anna.

translation.en: Unfortunately, the hotel has no hot water,
translation.it: Purtroppo, l'hotel non ha l'acqua calda.

translation.en: so you'll be staying in our guest accommodation for the time being.
translation.it: Alloggerete nella nostra camera degli ospiti.

translation.en: -I trust that's suitable. -That's very kind, thank you.
Well, there's a lot to survey before the town meeting.
translation.it: C'è molto da fare, prima della riunione.

translation.en: We best get started. Anna, settle Izzie in and show her around.
translation.it: Meglio iniziare. Anna, porta in giro Izzie.

translation.en: [quietly] Actually, I thought I'd...
Anna is a gracious host. I'm sure you'll have a wonderful time together.
translation.it: Anna è un'ottima padrona di casa. Vi divertirete.

translation.en: Town meeting, six o'clock.
I love your necklace, it's super vintage.
translation.it: Adoro la tua collana. Molto vintage.

translation.en: Oh, it's OK. You don't have to do that.
I've done this a lot
translation.it: Ho fatto spesso questa cosa e...

translation.en: and... some poor person always gets roped into showing around the new girl.
translation.it: Ho fatto spesso questa cosa e... c'è sempre qualcuno che deve portare in giro la tipa nuova.

translation.en: Well, I'm the mayor's daughter and that comes with certain obligations.
translation.it: Beh, sono la figlia del sindaco, e questo comporta dei doveri.

translation.en: I don't mind.
You can ride a bike, can't you?
-[sighs] -Who's this?
That is my great-grandmother.
The heroine of Cape Mercy.
We're the last remaining descendants of the shipwreck.
translation.it: Siamo gli ultimi discendenti del naufragio.

translation.en: [woman] Anna?
Um, you can put your stuff in the guest bedroom, I won't be long.
translation.it: Metti la tua roba nella camera degli ospiti. Non ci metterò molto.

translation.en: -And then I'll show you around. -Sure.
translation.it: - Poi ti porto a fare un giro. - Va bene.

translation.en: Hey, but... Anna.
Stevie! The table!
The last time we saw Lauren, she was here.
translation.it: L'ultima volta che abbiamo visto Lauren, era qui.

translation.en: - Right where we parked the 'Indy'. -Right.
translation.it: - Dove abbiamo messo la Indy. - Giusto.

translation.en: We find the boat, they'll see that the mast is down.
translation.it: Se troviamo la barca, vedranno che l'albero è abbassato.

translation.en: No-one can pilot a boat without a mast.
translation.it: Nessuno può pilotare una barca senza l'albero.

translation.en: They'll have to accept the storm washed it out to sea.
translation.it: Dovranno accettare che l'ha portata via la burrasca.

translation.en: -And then they'll start a land search. -Exactly.
translation.it: E cercheranno a terra. Esatto. Probabilmente l'ha beccata mentre tornava a casa.

translation.en: She probably got caught out riding home.
translation.it: Esatto. Probabilmente l'ha beccata mentre tornava a casa.

translation.en: You know, we'll find Lauren at the bottom of a landslide with a broken leg,
translation.it: Troveremo Lauren in fondo a una frana con una gamba rotta,

translation.en: furious we didn't find her sooner.
translation.it: furiosa perché non l'abbiamo trovata prima.

translation.en: We'll be back in this booth having lodestar burgers by Wednesday.
translation.it: Entro mercoledì, saremo qui a mangiare hamburger.

translation.en: Can I help you?
Yeah, hi, I'm Izzie.
[Anna] She's just arrived. The engineer's daughter.
translation.it: È appena arrivata. La figlia dell'ingegnere.

translation.en: -I'm Maddie. -Hi.
-This is a private meeting. -Stevie!
translation.it: È una riunione privata. - Stevie! - Cosa? È così!

translation.en: What?! It is!
Isn't it, Anna?
Usually, yes, but I'm showing her...
I'm not here to intrude. I'll just... Just wait here.
So a regular tide wouldn't have washed the 'Indy' from shore. But a cyclone...
translation.it: Una marea non avrebbe portato via la Indy, ma un ciclone...

translation.en: It totally could've dragged it up the northern coastline and anyone on board.
translation.it: Può averla trascinata a nord senza nessuno a bordo.

translation.en: I know, but this is a big stretch of coastline,
translation.it: Ma è un lungo tratto di costa.

translation.en: a small boat won't be easy to find.
translation.it: Non sarà facile trovare una barca piccola.

translation.en: [Anna] She's right. A thorough search could take days.
translation.it: Vero. Una ricerca approfondita può durare giorni.

translation.en: Not if we commandeer a boat.
I saw a boat.
When we flew in.
Was the mast still intact?
-I couldn't tell it had overturned. -[sighs]
Do you think you could locate it again?
translation.it: Pensi di poterla localizzare di nuovo?

translation.en: Yeah, I think so. [Izzie] Sorry, but who's Lauren?
translation.it: Sì, credo di sì. Scusate, ma chi è Lauren?

translation.en: -[Anna] She's our friend. -Oh.
And she's missing.
'Yacht's All Folks'? No.
'Seas the Day'? Eugh!
'Usain Boat'.
OK, that's actually pretty funny.
-[Maddie] Stevie! Hurry!
Careful.
Mm. Smashing.
-Stevie! -[grunts]
-Come on. -Come on, Izzie!
-[Maddie] Izzie! Jump! -[snorting]
[grandad] Oi!
[exclaims] Where are we going?
Stevie Harrison, you have that back in one piece!
[grandad] Not a scratch now!
[Anna] That is not the 'Indy'.
Might be something worth checking out.
[Stevie] What do you think?
Shall we?
But you don't know what's down there. I guess we'll find out.
translation.it: - Non sappiamo cosa ci sia là sotto! - Lo scopriremo.

translation.en: [Maddie] It's OK, Izzie, we never know what's down there.
translation.it: Tranquilla. Non sappiamo mai cosa c'è là sotto.

translation.en: That's the fun part.
Doing OK, little buddy?
Yeah! Why wouldn't I be?
[Izzie] I'm in the middle of the ocean with three complete strangers on a stolen boat.
translation.it: Sono sull'oceano con tre sconosciute, su una barca rubata.

translation.en: [Izzie] So how long has your friend been missing?
translation.it: Da quanto tempo è scomparsa, la vostra amica?

translation.en: Three days.
We don't think she took the boat out.
translation.it: Non pensiamo che abbia preso la barca.

translation.en: We're just trying to convince everyone else.
translation.it: Stiamo cercando di convincere gli altri.

translation.en: Medical deliveries.
Must have got lost overboard during the cyclone.
translation.it: Saranno cadute in mare durante il ciclone.

translation.en: Ha! We’re all gonna be in Grandma’s good books today, girls.
translation.it: Oggi faremo contenta la nonna, ragazze.

translation.en: -It's her heart medication. -[chuckles]
translation.it: È il suo farmaco per il cuore.

translation.en: You look like you need a hand.
Welcome back, man!
Why didn't you call? I would have come to visit.
translation.it: Perché non hai chiamato? Sarei venuto a trovarti.

translation.en: Juvie is not the sort of place you wanna visit. Trust me.
translation.it: Il carcere minorile non è un posto da visitare. Fidati.

translation.en: Well, we were all thinking about you.
How'd you go?
It turns out my sense of humor... Not really a big hit with the other inmates.
translation.it: Pare che il mio senso dell'umorismo non fosse gradito dagli altri detenuti.

translation.en: I’ll never end up back there again, Henry.
If there's anything I can do to make that happen, let me know and I’ll do it.
translation.it: Se posso fare qualcosa io, fammi sapere.

translation.en: You won't have to.
I’m gonna turn things around. I'm gonna pay off the stupid fine.
I'm gonna go back to school... And I'm gonna get Stevie back.
translation.it: riprenderò gli studi. E mi riprenderò Stevie.

translation.en: Have you seen her yet?
Nah.
She still mad?
Well, you stole a boat, then you sunk it,
translation.it: Beh, hai rubato una barca. E l'hai affondata.

translation.en: and then you landed yourself three months in prison.
translation.it: E poi sei finito in carcere per tre mesi.

translation.en: - So yeah. -[both] She's still mad.
translation.it: - Quindi sì. - È ancora arrabbiata. Sì.

translation.en: When did you get in?
First ferry I could get on.
Man, this storm has done a real number on this place.
translation.it: Cavolo, questa burrasca ha fatto un bel lavoro.

translation.en: You haven’t heard. Heard what?
Lauren’s missing.
What?!
No-one's seen her since the storm and...
The... 'Indy' is gone too.
That doesn’t make any sense.
They’ve had search parties out and everything.
translation.it: Hanno organizzato delle squadre di soccorso.

translation.en: I’m headed out there now.
Are you OK?
Yeah. She’ll turn up.
Yeah. Of course she will.
Look, I gotta go help with the search but...
It's really good to have you back, man.
translation.it: ma è bello riaverti qui, amico.

translation.en: It's good to see you too.
-Just in time, vnuchka! -Babushka!
translation.it: Appena in tempo, vnuchka! Babushka! Devi stare seduta, riposare!

translation.en: You should be off your feet, resting.
[scoffs] Please don’t fuss, dear Anna. I like the cool air.
translation.it: Non ti agitare, cara Anna. Mi piace l'aria fresca!

translation.en: Reminds me of our ancestors back in Mother Russia.
translation.it: Mi ricorda i nostri antenati in Madre Russia.

translation.en: Ah, Madeline, Stephanie, you look like you could do with something sweet.
translation.it: Madeline, Stephanie, volete qualcosa di dolce?

translation.en: -Thank you! - Thanks Grandma Reg.
You must be Isabelle. Welcome. [laughs]
-I've got you something. -Oh.
Oh. My heart medication!
translation.it: Oh, i miei farmaci per il cuore!

translation.en: You clever things. [kissing] Ah.
I may look robust, but beneath this spritely exterior,
translation.it: Ho l'aria arzilla, ma sotto questa corazza

translation.en: I am a very tired woman.
-Come along. -Oh.
[mayor] Good evening.
First and foremost, thank you to everyone in the community
translation.it: Buonasera. Prima di tutto, grazie a tutti i membri della comunità per i lavori di pulizia.

translation.en: for your continued clean-up efforts.
translation.it: grazie a tutti i membri della comunità per i lavori di pulizia.

translation.en: Our town is finally starting to look like itself again.
translation.it: La nostra città inizia finalmente a tornare alla normalità.

translation.en: I'm sorry we didn't find your boat.
translation.it: Peccato che non abbiamo trovato la tua barca.

translation.en: Better than finding it with the mast up and no Lauren.
translation.it: Meglio che trovarla con l'albero alzato e senza Lauren.

translation.en: -[mayor] The island's power... -There's still hope.
[mayor] ...infrastructure has been significantly damaged.
For the foreseeable future, we will experience rolling blackouts.
I know most of you have personal generators. So please use them.
translation.it: So che molti di voi hanno generatori personali, quindi usateli.

translation.en: In other good news, renowned structural engineer Dr. John Martin has arrived.
translation.it: Buone notizie, è arrivato il dr. John Martin, noto ingegnere!

translation.en: Alongside the Emergency Management Team,
Dr. Martin will work with the local council to get Cape Mercy up and running again
translation.it: il dr. Martin lavorerà con il consiglio per risistemare Cape Mercy

translation.en: in time to continue our oldest tradition, the annual Salvation Day Festival.
translation.it: in tempo per la nostra tradizione più antica: il Salvation Day.

translation.en: Yes.
-Anyone seen Henry? -Mm-mm.
[Anna] Chief doesn’t look so good.
translation.it: Lo sceriffo non ha una bell'aria.

translation.en: Who’s Chief?
Chief of Police. -Lauren’s dad. -Oh.
translation.it: Il capo della polizia. Padre di Lauren.

translation.en: As you all know, one of our precious daughters, Lauren Rose, is still missing.
translation.it: Come sapete, una delle nostre care figlie, Lauren Rose, manca all'appello.

translation.en: As mayor, I can assure you
that the search-and-rescue efforts will continue until...
translation.it: che gli sforzi di ricerca e soccorso continueranno fino...

translation.en: As mayor, I can assure you that the search-and-rescue efforts will continue...
translation.it: Posso assicurarvi che gli sforzi di ricerca e soccorso continueranno...

translation.en: Easy, Henry! Easy.
Bring it in, Henry.
[Maddie] The mast...
The mast is up.
